@Lmc2105 @KWR07 Couldnâ€™t agree more. Boyle so out of position tonight, couldnâ€™t use his pace and Kamberi looked a yard of the pace. MacLaren has to play and we need more creativity in the middle of the park.
@MichaelLinton27 @hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ Very possible, maybe heâ€™s green at heart ðŸ˜‰ðŸ’š
@MichaelLinton27 @hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ Kamara not a free agent so canâ€™t go south. Mulumbu is and can sign for whoever, surprised nobody has moved for him to be honest.

@MichaelLinton27 @hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ Yeah, like them all. Kamara would be my pick of the bunch. But would happily take any of them. Mulumbu wants to go south again I believe. Should have some money to try and sway him though.

@hibsboy69 @JamesLu28978099 @MichaelLinton27 @Atko__ Spot on. Heâ€™s gave us a threat from midfield, as well as set pieces that we have badly needed. Granted he can improve his tackling, but heâ€™s not been signed for that. Iâ€™d happily let him roam if we had two other centre mids to support him. Definitely need one more in.

@JamesLu28978099 @MichaelLinton27 @Atko__ And your telling me that all the attributes they have now they had when they started? No. Doesnâ€™t like a tackle at the moment, but he will soon learn in a Lennon team thatâ€™s part and parcel. Once again, heâ€™s been here literally weeks. Played a big part besides tackling.
@JamesLu28978099 @MichaelLinton27 @Atko__ Canâ€™t disagree heâ€™s missing certain parts to his game, but look at other players Lennon has improved. Give the boy time. Season has barely started.

@MichaelLinton27 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ We must have said similar about McGinn and McGeough when they both signed. Boy needs time and a genuinely midfield powerhouse next to him to help. Still got time to sort that out. Lennon has never let us down before. Time will tell.
@MichaelLinton27 @JamesLu28978099 @Atko__ His goal threat and wide balls are great. But close passing and creative passing needs work. Still a great player/prospect.
@Atko__ Bartley got full marks for me as well, until he went off he was superb when we were on the back foot. Him and Efe kept us in the tie.
